casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raul OLIVEROS. No. 80P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Adrian Dellinger, Associate Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Saul Oliveros, Polkton, for Oliveros, Raul. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of March 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
